meanings.definition: A stove used for cooking food.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother's old cookstove was always warm and cozy.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a delicious meal on the shiny cookstove.
meanings.sent3: The cookstove in the kitchen seemed to have a magical touch, turning ingredients into meals.
meanings.sent4: The cookstove hummed with activity, like a busy worker in a bustling kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread filled the room, emanating from the trusty cookstove.

meanings.definition: To cook food on a stove.
meanings.sent1: I will cookstove some vegetables for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: She loves to cookstove her favorite recipes on weekends.
meanings.sent3: When in doubt, just cookstove some pasta and call it a meal!
meanings.sent4: His passion for cooking was evident as he would cookstove for hours on end.
meanings.sent5: The chef would skillfully cookstove each dish to perfection, delighting the customers.
